content.text:
# Bardwell Ward

Bardwell Ward is one of a number of West Suffolk District wards created to come into force following the 2019 local elections held on 2 May 2019. This was part of the 2019â€“2023 structural changes to local government in England.
In 2018/19 it had a population of  2,703 persons living in 1,143 dwellings. According to 2011 statistics, about 65% of these dwellings were owner-occupied.
The Ward comprises
* Bardwell parish
* Barnham parish
* Coney Weston parish
* Euston parish
* Fakenham Magna parish
* Sapiston parish
* part of Honington parish
